about_the_game:
Explore a classic 2D JRPG-style world in this fantasy walking simulator! Can you find the Demon King?

GAMEPLAY & FEATURES

  • Walking simulator in a 2D JRPG-style world

  • Cross towns, caves, deserts, fields, and forests

  • Discover the dungeon lair of the Demon King

  • 30+ minutes of gameplay

BACKSTORY

In this world of humans fearful of the increasing number of monsters, the undeniable whisperings that the Demon King has returned are spreading...

The thief Batz, who thinks he is the center of the universe, pays these rumors no mind as he lives his life as usual, stealing anything he wishes to.

One day, while on his way to a bandit’s hideout he heard is being attacked by monsters, Batz is assailed by a monster himself. Luckily, he is saved by a battle maiden passing by...

CHARACTER

Lucida

A battle maiden sent by the gods in order to slay the Demon King that has made his appearance in the realm. She’s serious with a strong sense of duty and empathy.

She dislikes beating around the bush or being wishy-washy, and always tries to square things with reason. However, her inflexible character makes her easy pickings for Batz and causes her to lose over half her powers to him.

As she was only dispatched to defeat the Demon King, she doesn’t know much about humankind. Due to this lack of knowledge, she is unable to stop the frequent transgressions she suffers.

Batz

This game’s lone wolf protagonist spends his life thieving as he pleases. He is prideful, egotistical, and violent.

He thinks of everyone else as useful pawns and is easy on himself but ruthless with others. Following a certain incident, he successfully makes battle maiden Lucida his servant and has been ordering her about ever since.

short_description: Explore a classic JRPG world together with a cute battle maiden! Upon being rescued from a monster by a passing battle maiden, the protagonist Batz begins journeying together with her. But taking advantage of her weakness, the scoundrel Batz has other plans for his beautiful savior.
